natural solution: We know that opposite sides of a parallelogram are equal, thus, we can set: \begin{align} 2x + 3 &= 9 \\8y - 1 &= 7 \end{align}Thus, $2x = 6 \rightarrow x = 3$, and $8y = 8 \rightarrow y = 1$, thus $x + y = \boxed{4}$.
